steps.code: const name = document.querySelector('h1')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const bio = document.querySelector('.profile, [class*="bio"]')?.textContent?.trim()?.slice(0, 500) || ''; const members = []; document.querySelectorAll('[class*="member"] a, .group_members a').forEach(m => members.push(m.textContent?.trim())); return { name, bio, members, url: window.location.href };
